codeReview.summary: The fix commit addresses both prior blocking inaccuracies in docs/migration-v0.5.md and now matches source behavior. I reviewed both diffs (original failing commit 905c38dc and fix commit 8d776b82): the testCommand section now correctly states input is converted to CLI args, and the codemod section now correctly states transformation to .input(schema).action(). Source alignment was confirmed against packages/testing/src/test-command.ts and plugins/outfitter/shared/codemods/cli/commander-to-builder.ts.

sharedStateObservations.observation: docs-worker procedure/compliance tracking is slightly inconsistent for docs-only fixes: the skill procedure requires lint + typecheck + test, but this run recorded only lint while still marked followedProcedure=true with no deviations.
sharedStateObservations.evidence: .factory/skills/docs-worker/SKILL.md:65,68,71 lists bun run lint/typecheck/test under Verify; handoff for this run lists only bun run lint and sets followedProcedure true with deviations [] (.factory/missions/ae41b573-bba1-46f1-8355-b618b7b79237/handoffs/2026-02-28T02-58-58-512Z__fix-migration-docs-accuracy__2cdf058a-dff0-4571-87d8-acbbf3e9fa19.json:36,48-49).

summary: Pass: commit 8d776b82 resolves the two round-1 blockers by correcting the testCommand input-parsing description and the codemod target chain, with no remaining blocking inaccuracies found in scope.
